mapper.select: select * from area where level = 1 and id not in (3598,3599,3600)
select * from area where parentCode = #{code} and level = 2
select * from area a where a.parentCode in (select code from area where id = #{parentId} and level = 1) and a.level = 2
select * from area where id in ( #{areaId})

SELECT a.id AS provinceId, a.fullname AS provinceName, a.code AS provinceCode, b.id AS cityId, b.fullname AS cityName, b.code AS cityCode FROM area a LEFT OUTER JOIN area b ON a.code = b.parentcode WHERE a.level = 1 AND b.level = 2 order by a.id, b.id
SELECT b.id, b.fullName, a.id AS parentId FROM area a INNER JOIN area b ON a.code=b.parentCode WHERE b.id NOT IN (3598,3599,3600) ORDER BY b.id

SELECT a.id, a.fullname, IF(b.level = 1 OR b.level = 2,b.id,NULL) AS parentId FROM area a LEFT OUTER JOIN area b ON a.parentCode=b.code WHERE a.level IN (1,2) AND a.id NOT IN (3598,3599,3600) order by a.id
